code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import axios from'axios';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const statusOptions=[{value:'YENI',label:'Yeni'},{value:'DEVAM_EDIYOR',label:'Devam Ediyor'},{value:'TAMAMLANDI',label:'Tamamlandı'}];function AddProject(){const[name,setName]=useState('');const[description,setDescription]=useState('');const[status,setStatus]=useState('YENI');const navigate=useNavigate();const handleSubmit=async e=>{e.preventDefault();try{await axios.post('http://localhost:8080/api/projects',{name,description,status});navigate('/');}catch(err){alert('Proje eklenemedi!');}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Proje Ekle"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,style:{maxWidth:400},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{marginBottom:12},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{children:"Ad:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{value:name,onChange:e=>setName(e.target.value),required:true,style:{width:'100%'}})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{marginBottom:12},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{children:"A\xE7\u0131klama:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{value:description,onChange:e=>setDescription(e.target.value),required:true,style:{width:'100%'}})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{marginBottom:12},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{children:"Durum:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("select",{value:status,onChange:e=>setStatus(e.target.value),style:{width:'100%'},children:statusOptions.map(opt=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:opt.value,children:opt.label},opt.value))})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",children:"Kaydet"})]})]});}export default AddProject;
